attributes.action: Allow PCOS sufferers to claim exemption from prescription fees.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Diabetics get free prescriptions and cost the NHS money yet in most cases of PCOS the medications given to prevent diabeties and heart disease are charged, so effectively we are saving nhs money by avoiding this but paying too for an illness that is no-ones fault? no.
